DOC.brief_summary: This research study aim develop organizational-level intervention enable community adopt , adapt , implement sustain evidence-based intervention ( EBIs ) address cancer disparity among Latinos . The investigator partner faith-based organization , since play highly prominent role Latino community life . This three-phase study : ( 1 ) improve understanding organizational infrastructure , skill resource require Latino church implement EBIs cancer control , ( 2 ) develop capacity-building intervention ; ( 3 ) test intervention 's effectiveness randomize trial .
DOC.brief_title: Promoting Organizational Capacity Implement Cancer Control Programs Among Latino Churches
DOC.criteria: Parishes eligible Randomized trial : Roman Catholic , locate Massachusetts , offer religious service Spanish , take part organizational survey . Not Roman Catholic , locate Massachusetts , n't offer religious service Spanish , participate organizational survey .
